message: I propose a fair deal: 90% for me, 10% for you.  This ensures we both get a good share of the money.
Let's split it 60/40, a fairer deal for both of us.  It's better than letting the money depreciate further.
I'm willing to compromise further. Let's split it 70/30.  We both get a decent amount, and it's better than seeing the value of the money shrink even more.
